text: David Álvarez (born 13 October 1992) is a Colombian footballer who plays as a centre back for Ascenso MX club Oaxaca. ==External links== *David Alvarez at Official Liga MX Profile * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Once Caldas footballers Category:Atlético Junior footballers Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico
title: David Álvarez Agudelo
